t = input()
for i in range(t):
    n = input()
    a = map(int,raw_input().split())
    for j in range(n-1):
        if j%2==0:
            if a[j]>a[j+1]:
                a[j+1],a[j] = a[j],a[j+1]
        else:
            if a[j+1]>a[j]:
                a[j+1],a[j] = a[j],a[j+1]
    for x in a:
        print x,
